resources.string: Please pick your favorite shows and enjoy!

"Warning: This feature is experimental and can cause a crash on the application.
The Video stream is treated as a torrent download, and can stop playing at any given time depending on the total number of seeds or the internet speed.

The use of VLC player is recommended."
Click a link from the list bellow to download
This app was created mainly to satisfy my anime needs, but the world is so huge and full of people with the same interests as myself, I published the app for all to use.

There is some costs to maintaining the app, namely the webserver that\'s providing the API with the information of the anime, so I added some small ads, that I think don\'t disrupt the user experience, I myself use the app with the ads.
To watch the episode choose a quality (experimental)
Choose a theme to display the app
Report technical issues or suggest new features
This show was added to your favourites
This show was removed from your favourites
I would really appreciate you if rated this app, and if you really liked this app and want to buy me a coffee I\'ll put here a button for your convenience ;)
Deletes the episode after exiting the episode screen.
